title: Nemesis Jax chroma disabled? but not?
body:
Anyone know why this skin/chroma is disabled?

And I can still use it?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/7us2dkt0jl9ua8c/Jaxchroma2.PNG?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/pk5ijc6bjj5vlrc/jaxchroma3.PNG?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/e0va0eninndwer6/jaxchroma4.PNG?dl=0

replies.body: Currently the sale for that specific chroma is disabled while an issue is resolved.  Updates on that will be provided through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  If you already have him then you should be fine!
How about the players that wanted to buy the chroma for IP now that the sales are closed?
I see the Jax issue isn't on the service status page anymore. Does that mean you guys will have it available for IP soon?
Oh ok, thanks for the clarity. I'm guessing you know why I was confused.
